title: IHBT Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 20 Project Associate and Other Posts
description: Institute of Himalayan Bioresource Technology (IHBT) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 20 Project Associates and Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, B.Sc, and M.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, and salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the IHBT Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can att...
